name: Lady Death
description:
Lady death wants a vacation that anyone would die for. Your mission is to help her collect vicious souls and earn paychecks to afford her dream trip.

Anything has a price, life included. You will have to beat 4 levels and we hope that you have fun!

Controls:

- Spacebar : Jump
- X Key : Reap their souls

P.S : Some particles are buggy, don't mind that please, also there will be a mac build soon.

Please, leave your feedback in the comment and follow us on twitter!

Daniel Maida (@_maidess)
Maria Eugênia Franco (@mrgnf_)
